thread.title: Nice visit to London and good hotel
thread.title_full: Nice visit to London and good hotel - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Katya F
title: Nice visit to London and good hotel
text:
The location of the hotel was very good, close to tower hill tube where you can go to any place in London. Like few minutes walking. Room was huge. We were 2 adults and 2 kids of 16 and 11 years old. Each of them had their own bed. Room was cleaned everyday and towels changed. Breakfast was good. There was cold and warm food. Hotel personal very helpful and friendly. There are some places around to eat and market, but we didn't use them since we had dinner in downtown.
Room Tip: We had family room in ground floor and was very big and quite See more room tips
